g.text: sends a request to make an order
shows the list of the available products
chooses which products and which quantities to order
newOrder(address, amount, additionalFee, dateOrder, description, mapProducts)
order = addOrder(address, amount, additionalFee, dateOrder, description, mapProducts, client)
create(address, amount, additionalFee, dateOrder, description, mapProducts, client)
validates, presents the order and asks for a confirmation
registers the order and informs of the success of the operation
